title: 'Mysterious Black Balls' Spotted At Sydney Beaches
content: Hundreds of mysterious black tar-like balls have washed up on two popular Sydney beaches, prompting lifeguards to close the strands to swimmers.
summary: Hundreds of mysterious black tar-like balls have washed up on two popular Sydney beaches, prompting lifeguards to close the strands to swimmers.

title: On Nijjar Killing, US Says "Wanted To See India, Canada Cooperate But..."
content: The United States has called on India to cooperate with Canada's investigation into "extremely serious allegations" linking "agents" of the Indian government with the killing of Khalistani terrorist and Canadian citizen Hardeep Singh Nijjar.
summary: The United States has called on India to cooperate with Canada's investigation into "extremely serious allegations" linking "agents" of the Indian government with the killing of Khalistani terrorist and Canadian citizen Hardeep Singh Nijjar.

title: Canada Marine Protection Plan Aims To Serve As Global Model
content: Viewed from above, Canada's newest Marine Protected Area (MPA) is deceptively simple: stretches of blue Pacific Ocean waters and a few patches of green forest.
summary: Viewed from above, Canada's newest Marine Protected Area (MPA) is deceptively simple: stretches of blue Pacific Ocean waters and a few patches of green forest.

title: Lufthansa Fined 'Record' $4 Million For Barring Jewish Passengers
content: 128 Jewish passengers were denied boarding to a connecting flight after a few did not follow instructions, including anti-Covid mask requirements, on a flight from the US to Germany, US transport authorities said.
summary: 128 Jewish passengers were denied boarding to a connecting flight after a few did not follow instructions, including anti-Covid mask requirements, on a flight from the US to Germany, US transport authorities said.

title: Sri Lankan Pilot Locks Woman Colleague Out Of Cockpit Over Toilet Break
content: A pilot locked a woman co-pilotout of the cockpit of a Sydney-Colombo Sri Lankan Airlines flight when shetook a mid-air toilet break.
summary: A pilot locked a woman co-pilotout of the cockpit of a Sydney-Colombo Sri Lankan Airlines flight when shetook a mid-air toilet break.

title: Study Links Lower Caloric Intake To Increased Longevity In New Research
content: The research involving nearly one thousand genetically distinct mice examined the impact of various diets on lifespan.
summary: The research involving nearly one thousand genetically distinct mice examined the impact of various diets on lifespan.

title: US Elections: Kamala Harris Will 'Cut Her Own Path', Says Joe Biden
content: US President Joe Biden said Tuesday that Kamala Harris would "cut her own path" if elected, as the Democratic nominee tries to convince voters she would bring change to the White House.
summary: US President Joe Biden said Tuesday that Kamala Harris would "cut her own path" if elected, as the Democratic nominee tries to convince voters she would bring change to the White House.

title: "Hope He's Okay": Kamala Harris As Trump Dances During Town Hall
content: Kamala Harris went after her US presidential election rival Donald Trump's mental state and fitness for office Tuesday after the 78-year-old Republican's televised town hall veered into a surreal, impromptu music session.
summary: Kamala Harris went after her US presidential election rival Donald Trump's mental state and fitness for office Tuesday after the 78-year-old Republican's televised town hall veered into a surreal, impromptu music session.

title: Chinese Aquarium's 'Whale Shark' Turns Out To Be A Robot, Visitors Outraged
content: Excitement quickly turned to disappointment as visitors discovered the 'whale shark' was a mechanical imitation.
summary: Excitement quickly turned to disappointment as visitors discovered the 'whale shark' was a mechanical imitation.

title: Climate Change And Biodiversity Loss Should Be Addressed Together
content: Some approaches to tackling global warming can have unintended knock-on consequences for nature and the protection of biodiversity, say scientists urging a more coordinated effort on these challenges.
summary: Some approaches to tackling global warming can have unintended knock-on consequences for nature and the protection of biodiversity, say scientists urging a more coordinated effort on these challenges.

title: Plastics In Lungs, Hearts, And Brains Of Newborns, Study Raises Concerns
content: Researchers warn of potential long-term health effects, raising concerns about environmental microplastics and their impact on maternal and fetal health.
summary: Researchers warn of potential long-term health effects, raising concerns about environmental microplastics and their impact on maternal and fetal health.

title: "Nothing Like We Saw In Gaza": Israel Shares Video Of Hezbollah Tunnel
content: The Israeli military today released a video of a tunnel allegedly used by Hezbollah members in Lebanon and said it was "nothing like" the one built by Hamas in Gaza.
summary: The Israeli military today released a video of a tunnel allegedly used by Hezbollah members in Lebanon and said it was "nothing like" the one built by Hamas in Gaza.

title: Unemployed People In The UK May Get Weight-Loss Drugs To Return To Work
content: Health Secretary Wes Streeting believes these medications could be "life-changing" for individuals struggling with obesity.
summary: Health Secretary Wes Streeting believes these medications could be "life-changing" for individuals struggling with obesity.

title: Israeli Military Says 50 Rockets Fired From Lebanon
content: The Israeli military said around 50 projectiles were fired from Lebanon at the country's north early Wednesday, without any reports of casualties.
summary: The Israeli military said around 50 projectiles were fired from Lebanon at the country's north early Wednesday, without any reports of casualties.

title: North Korea Claims 1.4 Million Young People Joined Army This Week
content: North Korean state media on Wednesday said around 1.4 million young people including students and youth league officials joined or returned to the army this week.
summary: North Korean state media on Wednesday said around 1.4 million young people including students and youth league officials joined or returned to the army this week.

title: US Court Rules Meta Must Face Lawsuits Over Teen Addiction To Social Media
content: Facebook parent company Meta must face lawsuits by U.S. states accusing it of encouraging social media addiction among teens, a federal judge in California ruled on Tuesday.
summary: Facebook parent company Meta must face lawsuits by U.S. states accusing it of encouraging social media addiction among teens, a federal judge in California ruled on Tuesday.

title: Trump Understands Value of Financial Institutions, Says World Bank Chief
content: World Bank President Ajay Banga on Tuesday said former President Donald Trump understands the value of international financial institutions and how their lending can lead to expanded markets for American companies overseas.
summary: World Bank President Ajay Banga on Tuesday said former President Donald Trump understands the value of international financial institutions and how their lending can lead to expanded markets for American companies overseas.

title: Trump Claims Harris Is "Dying To See My Cholesterol" In Truth Social Rant
content: Kamala Harris questioned Donald Trump's state of mind today after the 78-year-old Republican's latest televised town hall metamorphosed into a bizarre, unexpected music session.
summary: Kamala Harris questioned Donald Trump's state of mind today after the 78-year-old Republican's latest televised town hall metamorphosed into a bizarre, unexpected music session.

title: Gaza War Damage Cost Likely Now $14 Billion To $20 Billion: World Bank
content: World Bank President Ajay Banga said on Tuesday that war damage from Israeli strikes on Gaza is now probably in the $14-20 billion range, and destruction from Israel's bombing of southern Lebanon will add to that regional total.
summary: World Bank President Ajay Banga said on Tuesday that war damage from Israeli strikes on Gaza is now probably in the $14-20 billion range, and destruction from Israel's bombing of southern Lebanon will add to that regional total.

title: How Far Can Trudeau Go As Personal Electoral Gain Trumps Diplomatic Ties
content: Justin Trudeau's attempts for personal electoral gains have reached a level where actual diplomatic relations are seeing a fallout over "the politics of vote-bank". Is his government's attempts to retain power proving to be the downfall of Canada?
summary: Justin Trudeau's attempts for personal electoral gains have reached a level where actual diplomatic relations are seeing a fallout over "the politics of vote-bank". Is his government's attempts to retain power proving to be the downfall of Canada?
